name: Alien Escape (itch) (GroundedGames)
description: You play as an alien who was named Bob by its captors. You crash landed your ship in the middle of the desert and are immediately surrounded by these strange fleshy beings with odd cloth on their bodies and ballistic weapons, how savage! They take you into their compound and spend weeks experimenting on you in horrible ways. But this is your chance to escape! They don’t know about the unique ability of your race, time travel! Using time travel, Bob breaks out of his cell and must get out of the compound and back to his ship. Fight against the primitive drones of the “humans” as they call them and solve their puzzles to get back home in order to tell the tale!
